author: Melanie Huff
comment: App doesn't work.   It sucks! !!!  Tried everything.   Uninstalling app!!!  DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP

reply.author: KJSK Developers
reply.content: Dear Melanie, we are sorry to know that the app didn't work on your  smart watch. Could you please let us know the model of your smartwatch by sending a mail to kjsk.developers@gmail.com. we will help you to install the app. We already have few hundreds of users who are able to use it successfully. Thanks.
